title: Zscaler Internet Access - Web
description: This dashboard provides detailed insights into web traffic as captured in Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA) logs.

definition.content:
[Zscaler Internet Access](https://www.zscaler.com/products-and-solutions/zscaler-internet-access) (ZIA) is a secure Internet and web gateway delivered as a service from the cloud.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive, high-level view of web traffic and security events captured by Zscaler Internet Access. It offers insights into user activity, bandwidth utilization, cloud application usage, data loss prevention (DLP), file transfers, SSL behaviors, threat intelligence, and more.

For more information, see the [Zscaler Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/z-scaler/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
